DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect treatment patient acutely admit Psychiatric Intensive Care Unit ( PICU ) either sparsely decorate interior interior decoration like ordinary , Norwegian home .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Different Interior Decorations Psychiatric Intensive Care Unit .
DOC.detailed_description: The PICU Østmarka psychiatric department , St. Olavs Hospital contain 2 identical part . Each part contain 2 bed . The PICU traditional sparsely decorate interior . In cooperation architect county building authority one part redecorate interior like ordinary Norwegian home . All patient admit PICU semi-randomized either traditional `` Norwegian home '' interior decoration . Symptoms , behaviour , treatment evaluate admittance , day 3 discharge PICU
DOC.criteria: All patient acutely admit PICU , St. Olavs Hospital , Østmarka dep . Patients dementia mental retardation extensive degree . Patients speak Norwegian English
